channel.title: CVE Feed for ADT -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ADT -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-8101|2024-09-17T02:06:52.109Z -- adt -- lifeshield%20diy%20hd%20video%20doorbell
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in a Command ('Command Injection') vulnerability in HTTP interface of ADT LifeShield DIY HD Video Doorbell allows an attacker on the same network to execute commands on the device. This issue affects: ADT LifeShield DIY HD Video Doorbell version 1.0.02R09 and prior versions.
